Package fr.formiko.usuel

Class color

java.lang.Object
fr.formiko.usuel.color
public class color
extends java.lang.Object
Color used by linux console.
All String can be call by color.NAME.
To set back to normal color use color.NEUTRAL.
Author:
Hydrolien
